lyrics:
8 contributorsshow me lyricsintro
hows life
great everybodys going through something
they gotta get over it
you cant go around
lets just enjoy the time

verse 1
the night is young
you know weve just begun
lets have some fun
until the moon turns to the sun
look out the djs got this party jumping
its easy to let loose when you sipping something
relax its what you deserve
theres no need to be reserved

youll be going going all night can you stay up

have another round and just enjoy this party
put your fear aside go head and grab somebody
aint no limit no such thing as too much
and if you cause a line in the vi
im waiting on you to show me
